1535318378134614018.text: Humans are not meant to survive alone. The perception of isolation and feeling of loneliness have negative consequences for socioemotional and physical health and are risk factors for disease and early death.

1512358110190620674.text:
@Bloo_pup My 22 year old is autistic. 
When he was small & I'd pick him up from nursery, I'd see him with his lined up toys. Alone. It wasn't the lining up that bothered me, it was my perceived perception of isolation. All the other children, playing together, whilst my child was alone 1/
